Reference

Standard MCTQ

fd()

Compute MCTQ free days

so()

Compute MCTQ sleep onset

gu()

Compute MCTQ local time of getting out of bed

sd()

Compute MCTQ sleep duration

tbt()

Compute MCTQ total time in bed

ms()

Compute MCTQ mid-sleep

sd_week()

Compute MCTQ average weekly sleep duration

msf_sc() chronotype()

Compute MCTQ chronotype/corrected midsleep on work-free days

sloss_week()

Compute MCTQ weekly sleep loss

sjl() sjl_rel()

Compute MCTQ Social Jet Lag

le_week()

Compute MCTQ average weekly light exposure

Data

std_mctq

A standard MCTQ dataset

Utilities

convert_to() convert_to_tu() convert_to_ut() convert_to_tt() convert_to_uu() convert_to_pt() convert_to_pu()

Convert a R object to another

pretty_mctq()

Transform a MCTQ dataset

qplot_mctq()

Quick plot for MCTQ variables

random_mctq()

Build a random MCTQ case

validate_mctq() is_valid()

Validate values from a standard MCTQ dataset
